c74object.name: fl.correlate~
c74object.digest: Calculate the correlation of two input frames, (using frequency domain processing internally).
c74object.description: The output is a frame of length M + N - 1 where M and N are the lengths of the two inputs respectively

entry.name: 0. /maxlength [instantiation int]
entry.description: Sets the maximum output length. The output length will be M + N - 1 where M and N are the sizes of the two inputs respectively

entry.name: 1. /mode [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the type of input expected / output produced.
[0] - real [1] - complex

entry.name: 2. /edges [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
No parameter info available
[0] - linear [1] - circular [2] - wrap [3] - fold
